example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تجددت) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM الهجمات)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN قواعد) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التحالف) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولي)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN المناهض) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لارهاب)))))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN افغانستان))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: Attacks on the rules of the international coalition against terrorism in Afghanistan

example.arg: الهجمات على قواعد التحالف الدولي المناهض للارهاب في افغانستان
